attributes.action: Give people the right to identify and locate paedophiles
attributes.additional_details:
We as parents need to be aware of where Paedophiles are living, what streets and what they look like, their pictures should be published with their street locations in all local media as a matter of course.
There must be more transparency,
We want to stop these people from mingling with the rest of us, they know who we and our children are, so we have the right to know who they are
The police should also stop arresting people for outing them
